overall_assessment.reasoning: High-quality Jira input with detailed problem statements, clear target users, and explicit business goals. VOC analysis from Confluence provides strong customer evidence with 35 feedback entries across multiple themes. Strong alignment between customer pain points and proposed resource hub features.

section_assessments.action_taken: Populated from Jira metadata - issue key, title, author, stakeholders, linked issues
section_assessments.reasoning: Direct 1:1 mapping from Jira fields with no interpretation required

section_assessments.action_taken: Synthesized business problem from Jira description; integrated VOC analysis with 35 customer feedback entries across 5 themes
section_assessments.reasoning: Rich context provided in Jira with explicit problem statements and 'The Why' section. VOC data provides strong customer evidence.
section_assessments.review_focus: Verify VOC quotes are appropriate for customer-facing documentation

section_assessments.action_taken: Extracted three segments from Jira; inferred behaviors and constraints from VOC patterns
section_assessments.reasoning: Segments clearly defined in Jira. Behavioral details inferred from VOC showing 60% mobile usage and frustration patterns.
section_assessments.review_focus: Validate segment characteristics with actual user research

section_assessments.action_taken: Mapped business goals from Jira 'Expected ROI' section; created success metrics framework
section_assessments.reasoning: Goals explicitly stated in Jira description. Framework derived from stated objectives without specific values.
section_assessments.review_focus: Analytics team to validate metric definitions and establish baselines

section_assessments.action_taken: Synthesized In Scope features from Jira problem statements and recommendations; marked Out of Scope as TBD
section_assessments.reasoning: Content types and features derived from stated goals. Out of Scope correctly reserved for Scoping Agent.
section_assessments.review_focus: Engineering review for technical feasibility and resource constraints

section_assessments.action_taken: Marked all items as TBD for Design/UX Agent; preserved inspiration reference
section_assessments.reasoning: Correctly maintained TBD placeholders per agent boundaries

section_assessments.action_taken: Created framework structure based on objectives; left specific values for Analytics validation
section_assessments.reasoning: KPI categories align with Jira goals. Specific targets appropriately left undefined.
section_assessments.review_focus: Analytics team to define specific targets and measurement methodology

section_assessments.action_taken: Marked as TBD for Analytics Agent
section_assessments.reasoning: Correctly maintained TBD placeholders per agent boundaries

section_assessments.action_taken: Identified standard risks from context including content maintenance, adoption, and resource constraints
section_assessments.reasoning: Standard risks identified; may miss domain-specific technical risks requiring engineering input
section_assessments.review_focus: Engineering review for technical integration risks

section_assessments.action_taken: Created phased approach aligning with Jira MVP recommendation; outlined beta group and training needs
section_assessments.reasoning: Phase structure aligns with recommendations; specific timing and resources TBD
section_assessments.review_focus: Stakeholder validation on timeline and resource allocation

section_assessments.action_taken: Defined monitoring cadence, content governance, and iteration approach
section_assessments.reasoning: Standard monitoring practices; content governance emphasis from Jira ownership questions

section_assessments.action_taken: Captured genuine ambiguities from Jira including platform, ownership, and integration questions
section_assessments.reasoning: Questions directly derived from Jira recommendations and identified gaps

data_sources_used.reasoning: Comprehensive epic with detailed description, clear problem statements, explicit goals, and specific recommendations. Well-structured input.
Recent customer feedback (Nov 4-16, 2025) with 35 entries across multiple survey types. Clear sentiment and attribution data.
Search returned related content but limited direct VOC data beyond primary page.

decisions_made.reasoning: VOC data shows 60% of feedback from mobile devices with acute pain points
decisions_made.validation_needed: Confirm actual device distribution with analytics

decisions_made.decision: MVP phased approach with three stages
decisions_made.reasoning: Directly recommended in Jira recommendations section
decisions_made.validation_needed: Workshop to define phase boundaries and content priorities

decisions_made.decision: Include all 5 VOC themes in feature mapping
decisions_made.reasoning: All themes appear with significant frequency and map to hub objectives
decisions_made.validation_needed: Product team validation on theme prioritization

decisions_made.reasoning: Ownership question highlighted multiple times in Jira recommendations
decisions_made.validation_needed: Workshop to define ownership model and responsibilities

assumptions_made.assumption: Resource hub will be a customer-facing web experience
assumptions_made.reasoning: Jira references website inspiration (WhatsApp Blog) and web-accessible content
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: May need different architecture if mobile app integration required

assumptions_made.assumption: Self-service resources will reduce support ticket volume
assumptions_made.reasoning: Standard industry pattern; explicitly stated goal in Jira
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: Hub may increase awareness of issues and initially spike tickets
assumptions_made.validation_needed: Establish baseline support metrics before launch

assumptions_made.assumption: Internal teams will maintain content long-term
assumptions_made.reasoning: Ownership explicitly questioned in Jira recommendations
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: Content becomes stale without clear ownership
assumptions_made.validation_needed: Workshop to define governance and ownership model

assumptions_made.assumption: WhatsApp Blog is appropriate design inspiration
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: B2C blog format may not suit B2B distribution context

quality_checks_performed.check: All TBD placeholders preserved for external agents
quality_checks_performed.details: Section 6 (Feature Docs), Section 8 (Analytics), Out of Scope items all marked TBD

quality_checks_performed.check: No content in reserved agent sections
quality_checks_performed.details: Wireframes, mockups, analytics events all appropriately empty

quality_checks_performed.check: Problem statement is customer-centric with evidence
quality_checks_performed.details: VOC section includes 20+ customer quotes with full attribution

quality_checks_performed.check: Target users specifically defined with constraints
quality_checks_performed.details: Three segments with needs, behaviors, and constraints documented
Framework defined with specific metric categories
Launch phases, review sequence, and next steps clearly defined
12 open questions with context for resolution
All 12 sections present with correct numbering

quality_checks_performed.check: All claims backed by Jira data or marked as assumptions
quality_checks_performed.details: Assumptions table documents 4 key assumptions with validation needs

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Add validated user research for each segment
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Conduct 3 user interviews per segment to validate characteristics
Engineering review of integration points and technical constraints
Workshop output on resource availability and target dates

recommended_review_sequence.focus: Overall alignment with vision, priority validation, scope accuracy
Technical feasibility, integration risks, resource requirements
UX considerations, design handoff preparation, inspiration alignment
Content strategy, launch communications, VOC accuracy
